net.dermetfan.gdx.assets

Class AnnotationAssetManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.assets.AssetManager
      • net.dermetfan.gdx.assets.AnnotationAssetManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class AnnotationAssetManager
extends com.badlogic.gdx.assets.AssetManager
    An AssetManager that loads assets from annotated fields and methods using reflection.
    Author:
    dermetfan, Matthew 'siD' Van der Bijl
    See Also:
    dermetfan's Annotation Asset Manager

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  AnnotationAssetManager.Asset
      Provides information about assets that fields or methods represent.

      • getAssetType

        private static java.lang.Class getAssetType(AnnotationAssetManager.Asset asset,
                                            java.lang.Object pathObj)
        Parameters:
        asset - The Asset annotation the field or method pathObj was extracted from is annotated with. May be null if pathObj is an AssetDescriptor.
        pathObj - the Object specifying a path of an asset, extracted from the field or method annotated with the given Asset annotation
        Returns:
        the type of the specified asset

      • getAssetLoaderParameters

        private static com.badlogic.gdx.assets.AssetLoaderParameters getAssetLoaderParameters(AnnotationAssetManager.Asset asset,
                                                                                      java.lang.Object pathObj,
                                                                                      java.lang.Class containerType,
                                                                                      java.lang.Object container)
        Parameters:
        asset - the Asset annotation the field or method pathObj was extracted from is annotated with
        pathObj - the Object specifying a path of an asset, extracted from the field or method annotated with the given Asset annotation
        container - An instance of the field's or method's declaring class. May be null if it's static.
        Returns:
        the AssetLoaderParameters associated with the specified asset

      • load

        private void load(AnnotationAssetManager.Asset asset,
                  java.lang.Object objPath,
                  java.lang.Class<?> containerType,
                  java.lang.Object container)
        Parameters:
        asset - The @Asset annotation annotating the field or method obj was extracted from. May be null if obj is an AssetDescriptor.
        objPath - the Object describing the asset path, extracted from a field or method
        containerType - The class containing the field or method obj was extracted from. May be null if obj is an AssetDescriptor or no AssetLoaderParameters are specified by the @Asset annotation.
        container - The instance of containerType. May be null if the field or method containing the AssetLoaderParameters is static or no AssetLoaderParameters are specified by the @Asset annotation.

      • load

        private <T> void load(java.lang.Class<T> container,
                      T instance)
        Parameters:
        container - the class which fields and methods annotated with Asset to load
        instance - an instance of the container class
